Html:
Hi,

    I found, I can only add link tag in body section of the document but I am not allowed to put that in header/footer. Microsoft word allows putting links in header/footer. Where is the exact problem?

 

Regards,

Swarnendu

Hello Swarnendu,

this feature isn't implemented by the moment.
The problem is that each hyperlink has a relation-id to the corresponding relation xml file in the word package.
You cannot just add the "addLink" function to the header/footer class because the O2007-writer doesn't support this feature. Its complex to implement.


raw

Hi,

   Got your point. Thanks for your reply.

 

Regards,

Swarnendu
